turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you order me a drink from Peet's Coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah sure. Are you going to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'll pick it up at the Redondo Beach Peet's Coffee location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think a latte would good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Just a plain latte? Or would you like some kind of flavored one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a caramel latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I get you a hot one or an iced one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You usually order non-dairy drinks, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right, so make sure they make it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there anything else you'd like to add to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like some light whipped cream too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've got a large hot almond milk caramel latte with light whipped topping. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have placed your order at the Redondo Beach Peet's Coffee. It will be ready for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent via text message to your mobile device. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Indeed. Have a nice evening.
